data.content:
noun
[noncount] :a section of a hospital where special medical equipment and services are provided for patients who are seriously injured or ill
patients in intensive care = patients in the intensive care unit [=ICU] also; :the medical care provided in such a section
Her condition will require intensive care.
sự chăm sóc tập trung (ở bệnh viện, đối với bệnh nhân ốm nguy kịch)
